item.description: We will be getting together to watch the movie adaptation of Carl Sagan's book "Contact".  If you haven't seen it or if you haven't seen it in a while it's worth the watch!  Carl Sagan and his wife Ann Druyan were responsible for the screenplay so it stays pretty true to the author's vision.  There will be time for discussion after the movie for any interested.  Feel free to bring comfy lawn chairs if you wish.
item.name: July Meeting - Movie Night "Contact"
